channel.title: Tuples on Codeless Code
channel.description: Recent content in Tuples on Codeless Code

item.title: Unchained Tuple Types
item.description: Using TypeScript’s asserts syntax to create imperative-style type mutations, moving beyond method chaining to more familiar iterative patterns for complex type operations.

item.title: String Deduplication on the Type Level
item.description: Solving the classic string deduplication algorithm entirely within TypeScript’s type system using literal string types and recursive type manipulation.

item.title: Chained Tuple Types
item.description: TypeScript 4.1’s variadic tuple types enable building complex type-safe data structures through method chaining, where each operation expands the chain’s type signature at compile time.
